description: This file provides utility functions for parsing and handling HTTP simple messages, including token comparisons, character searches, hex conversions, multipart boundary parsing, header analysis, and form data copying. It supports parsing multipart form data, extracting headers, and saving file uploads.

methods.name: BOOL HttpSmpoTokenIs(PUCHAR tokenName,PUCHAR httpToken)
methods.description: Compares a token name with an HTTP token string to check if they are identical.

methods.name: int HttpSmpoMemFindChar(PUCHAR pBuf,ULONG ulBufLen,UCHAR aChar,BOOL bCaseSensitive)
methods.description: Searches for a specific character in a buffer, with optional case sensitivity, returns position or -1 if not found.

methods.name: ULONG HttpSmpoHexString2Ulong(PUCHAR pHexString)
methods.description: Converts a hexadecimal string to an unsigned long integer.

methods.name: BOOL HttpSmpoDecodeUrlGetHex(UCHAR uc,PUCHAR pHex)
methods.description: Converts a URL-encoded character into its hexadecimal value, returns success or failure.

methods.name: PUCHAR HttpSmpoMultipartFindBoundary(PUCHAR pBuf,ULONG ulBufLen,PUCHAR pBoundary,PBOOL pbEndBoundary)
methods.description: Finds the boundary marker for multipart messages within a buffer, indicates if it's an end boundary.

methods.name: PUCHAR HttpSmpoMultipartFieldName(PUCHAR pHeaders,ULONG ulHeaderLen,PULONG pulNameLen)
methods.description: Extracts the field name from multipart headers.

methods.name: BOOL AnscAnalyzeMultipartContentType(ANSC_HANDLE hHttpSmpo,PUCHAR pHeaders,ULONG ulHeaderLen,PULONG pulContentType)
methods.description: Determines the content type of a multipart message (text or binary).

methods.name: ULONG HttpSmpoMultipartContentType(ANSC_HANDLE hHttpSmpo,ANSC_HANDLE hPart)
methods.description: Gets the content type of a specific part in a multipart message.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSmpoGetMultipartPart(ANSC_HANDLE hHttpSmpo,PUCHAR pBuf,ULONG ulBufLen,PUCHAR pBoundary,ANSC_HANDLE hPart,PUCHAR * pNextPart)
methods.description: Parses a multipart message part, retrieving headers, content, and boundary position.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSmpoLocateFieldData(ANSC_HANDLE hHttpMbo,char * param_name,char * pBoundary,ANSC_HANDLE * phStartField,PULONG pulFieldOffset,ANSC_HANDLE * phStartBdo,PULONG pulStartOffset,ANSC_HANDLE * phEndBdo,PULONG pulEndOffset)
methods.description: Locates the data for a specific form field within multipart data, returning start/end BDOs and offsets.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSmpoSaveFieldData(ANSC_HANDLE hHttpMbo,char * file_name,BOOL bFlushBody,ANSC_HANDLE hStartField,ULONG ulFieldOffset,ANSC_HANDLE hStartBdo,ULONG ulStartOffset,ANSC_HANDLE hEndBdo,ULONG ulEndOffset)
methods.description: Saves form field data or uploaded file content to disk, optionally removing BDOs after.

methods.name: BOOL HttpSmpoFindNextBoundary(ANSC_HANDLE hHttpMbo,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,ULONG ulOffset,char * pBoundary,ANSC_HANDLE * phBdo,PULONG pulOffset)
methods.description: Finds the next boundary delimiter in multipart data chain, returning boundary position, BDO, and offset.

methods.name: BOOL HttpSmpoGetFormField(ANSC_HANDLE hHttpMbo,char * pFieldName,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,ULONG ulOffset,char * pBoundary,ANSC_HANDLE * phBdo,PULONG pulOffset)
methods.description: Finds a specific form field within multipart headers and position, updates BDO and offset.

methods.name: PUCHAR HttpSmpoCopyFormData(PUCHAR pBuf,PULONG pulBufSize,PULONG pulDataLen,PUCHAR pData,ULONG ulDataLen)
methods.description: Copies form data between buffer chains, managing buffer size and memory allocation.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSmpoCopyFormData2(ANSC_HANDLE hHttpMbo,PUCHAR * ppBuf,PULONG pulBufSize,PULONG pulDataLen,char * pBoundary,ANSC_HANDLE hStartBdo,ULONG ulStartOffset,ANSC_HANDLE hEndBdo,ULONG ulEndOffset)
methods.description: Copies a segment of form data from start to end BDO along with buffer management, used for non-file form data.

ctags.name: HttpSmpoCopyFormData2
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hHttpMbo,PUCHAR * ppBuf,PULONG pulBufSize,PULONG pulDataLen,char * pBoundary,ANSC_HANDLE hStartBdo,ULONG ulStartOffset,ANSC_HANDLE hEndBdo,ULONG ulEndOffset)

ctags.name: HttpSmpoFindNextBoundary
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hHttpMbo,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,ULONG ulOffset,char * pBoundary,ANSC_HANDLE * phBdo,PULONG pulOffset)

ctags.name: HttpSmpoGetFormField
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hHttpMbo,char * pFieldName,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,ULONG ulOffset,char * pBoundary,ANSC_HANDLE * phBdo,PULONG pulOffset)

ctags.name: HttpSmpoGetMultipartPart
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hHttpSmpo,PUCHAR pBuf,ULONG ulBufLen,PUCHAR pBoundary,ANSC_HANDLE hPart,PUCHAR * pNextPart)

ctags.name: HttpSmpoLocateFieldData
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hHttpMbo,char * param_name,char * pBoundary,ANSC_HANDLE * phStartField,PULONG pulFieldOffset,ANSC_HANDLE * phStartBdo,PULONG pulStartOffset,ANSC_HANDLE * phEndBdo,PULONG pulEndOffset)

ctags.name: HttpSmpoSaveFieldData
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hHttpMbo,char * file_name,BOOL bFlushBody,ANSC_HANDLE hStartField,ULONG ulFieldOffset,ANSC_HANDLE hStartBdo,ULONG ulStartOffset,ANSC_HANDLE hEndBdo,ULONG ulEndOffset)
